note: Specialized runner - see extra_data for details

vulnerability_location.description: External call to `_addr.call.value` occurs before updating `Holders[_addr]`, allowing a reentrant call to exploit the unchanged balance
Misnamed constructor ‘initTokenBank’ is a public function without any onlyOwner check, allowing anyone to reset the owner and MinDeposit values
In Deposit(), Holders[msg.sender] += msg.value can overflow unchecked. In WithdrawToHolder(), Holders[_addr] -= _wei can underflow since _wei is not checked against the current balance.
Low-level call using token.call(...) without checking the returned success flag

State variable Holders[_to] is reset to 0 before the external token transfer call. If the token.call fails, the holder’s balance is lost and cannot be withdrawn again, causing a denial-of-service for that holder.
Low-level call to token contract using token.call(...transfer...) without checking the return value – an unsafe external call pattern.
